name: Community Environment Day at David Crombie Park
description:
Join Councillor Malik (Ward 10) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each â€“ cash, debit and credit accepted).
